House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07886
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE NATIONAL TRAFFIC ENFORCEMENT AND MANAGEMENT CENTER, DEFINING ITS POWERS, FUNCTIONS AND DUTIES, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Seeks to establish a National Traffic Enforcement and Management Center that shall be responsible to build the capacity of traffic enforcers, assess the capability of traffic enforcement and management of personnel of the various Local Government Units (LGUs), research on the causes and consequences of road accidents and such other functions related to road traffic enforcement, education and management.
ALIAS NAME : “National Traffic Enforcement and Management Act.”
